user_query: I'm planning a trip to Finland and I want to know the type of my rental car based on the license plate number 'AFM915'. Can you provide me with this information? Additionally, I would like to check the availability of the trademark 'amazon' using the USPTO Trademark API.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the type of the rental car based on the license plate number 'AFM915'.
Check the availability of the trademark 'amazon' using the USPTO Trademark API.
